help: **-ft map** - View a map of available timezones.
**-ft set <timezone>** - Set yourself to a timezone.
**-ft invite** - Invite Friend Time to your server.
**-ft support** - Get help or report an issue.
map: Please visit the following link and choose your timezone:
Then enter **-ft set <timezone>** with your timezone.
**Note**: Use a timezone in the format **<region>/<city>**. For example: *America/New_York*. Timezone abbreviations like *EST* or *GMT* will not work.
noTimezoneProvided: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
invalidTimezone: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
invite: Visit the following link to invite Friend Time to your Discord server:
support: Visit the following link to join the Friend Time support server:
If you prefer, you can also submit a GitHub issue:
timezoneNotSet: Hi {USERNAME}, it looks like you don't have a timezone set yet.
Please type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
Then type **-ft set <timezone>** to set yourself to that timezone.

shard.loginFailed: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] Login failed. Please check that you've placed the correct Discord bot token in the config file.
shard.disconnect: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client's WebSocket disconnected and will no longer attempt to reconnect.
shard.reconnecting: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client is trying to reconnect to the WebSocket.
shard.resume: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client's WebSocket resumed. {REPLAYED_EVENT_COUNT} events were replayed.
shard.rateLimit: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client hit a rate limit while making a request.
shard.error: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] The Discord client WebSocket encountered a connection error.

sql.connectError: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] An error occured while connecting to database.

dbl.serverCountPosted: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] Server count posted to Discord Bot List!
dbl.error: [Shard {SHARD_ID}] An error occured with Discord Bot List.

info.retrieveShardCountError: [Manager] An error occured while retrieving recommended shard count.
